definitions.definition: A mechanical device that loads ordnance into weapons such as tanks and artillery that would otherwise be loaded by a dedicated crew .
A mechanical device that automatically loads storage media (such as tapes or disks ) into the device that can read them.
A software mechanism that automatically locates and loads classes etc. as required at run time .

main_definition: ( military ) A mechanical device that loads ordnance into weapons such as tanks and artillery that would otherwise be loaded by a dedicated crew .
secondary_definitions: ( computing ) A mechanical device that automatically loads storage media (such as tapes or disks ) into the device that can read them.
( programming ) A software mechanism that automatically locates and loads classes etc. as required at run time .
